location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, John Sebastian Natter, to Dymock Lyster and George Skipp, East India Company factors at Bussora [Bushire]

mods.abstract: The letter deals mostly with the negotiations with Carim Caun [Karim Khan] regarding the Chaub [Banu Kaâ€˜b], with an offer to help however they can. Notification of the detention of the Defianceat Bushire is also given.
